name: Hackblaster
description:
In Hackblaster you have to hack a computer and retrieve a file. Hacking is represented with platformer gameplay. To retrieve the file you must work your way through the levels making choices between levels at the laptop.  The player has to move, jump, create unstable data clusters and activate them to progress through the game.

Controls

  • Move left - A
  • Move Right - D
  • Jump - Space
  • Create data cluster - left click
  • Activate data cluster - right click 

On completion press Esc to restart game
